DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate superior efficacy NK-104-CR 8 mg daily compare Livalo速 IR 4 mg daily fast serum low-density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) reduction evaluate comparative safety NK-104-CR 8 mg daily Livalo速 IR 4 mg daily long-term treatment
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy & Long-term Safety Comparison Study NK-104-CR & Livalo速 IR With Primary Hyperlipidemia Mixed Dyslipidemia
